org.p2psockets
Class P2PSocketLooupManager

java.lang.Object
  org.p2psockets.P2PSocketLooupManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class P2PSocketLooupManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class implements an active Advertisement hunter. It caches advs local so that they can be quickly retrieved a connection time.

Author:
Alex Lynch

getAdvertisements

public java.util.Enumeration getAdvertisements()
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Helper method to get the cached advs

Returns:
An Enumeration of PipeAdvertisements representing the active server nodes on the network. This comes straight from the jxta DiscoveryServer
Throws:
java.io.IOException
